participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.background: My favorite color is green. I love watching funny movies. I like to play tennis. My dad is a veteran.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.background: I was once on the local news, and not for anything illegal. My father used to drive a taxi cab in the 1970s. My uncle used to work on fish boats in Florida. I've been to Canada two times my entire life.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch funny movies, play tennis, and go for walks.
I like to do those things too! I've been to Canada twice in my life. Did you like it there?
I did, it was very beautiful. I've never been on the news, but my father was a taxi driver in the 1970s and my uncle worked on fish boats in Florida.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to be on the news. What was your dad's favorite part about being a taxi driver?
He loved meeting new people and seeing all the different parts of the city.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I think I would enjoy being a taxi driver.
It was a great job, but he's retired now. He enjoys spending his time fishing and going for walks.
I'm glad he's enjoying his retirement. I'm sure he's a great dad.
